creator: Eilz2PSAEAA
name: Servicemesh - Autopilot health Detector
programText:
A = data('gauge.consul.autopilot.healthy', filter=filter('plugin', 'consul')).publish(label='A')
detect(when(A < threshold(1), lasting='1m')).publish('Servicemesh - Autopilot health Detector')

rules.description: The value of gauge.consul.autopilot.healthy is below 1 for 1m.
